author: ladybug50101
title: Lovely stay at Royal Park - Review
text: Very lovely hotel, the room was cozy and comfortable. Every night there were cookies waiting after a long day of sightseeing and even a bottle of wine. The staff was friendly and helpful, they taught us how to use the subway and mapped everything out for us very clearly. Also, there is a great restaurant and bar, very intimate setting with a gorgeous fireplace, would highly recommend. We were very pleased with everything and would most definitely recommend it to others!
